price: 43. Voici la Géhenne que ces scélérats tenaient pour mensonge !
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
